attributes.action: Make Police treat a Resident Parent Blocking a Child Contact Order as Domestic Abuse/Violence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When one parent( mostly dads) has gone to court to obtain a Contact Order to ensure the continuity that is so important in a childs life and then to find that the Resident Parent is refusing or denying court ordered parenting time to take place for the Non Resident parent.
The police should treat this just as any other incident of Domestic Abuse /Violence and take the approriate action to ensure the Court Order is adhered to.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
